entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning. Fog at times late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
